mapper.insert: insert into experience( user_id, title, content, like_num, unlike_num ) values ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{likeNum}, #{unlikeNum} )
mapper.select: select e.experience_id as "commId", e.user_id as "userId", u.name, u.head_image as "headImage", e.title, e.content, e.like_num as "likeNum", e.unlike_num as "unlikeNum" from experience e left join sys_user u on e.user_id=u.user_id
select * from experience where title like "%"#{title}"%"

select e.experience_id as "commId", e.user_id as "userId", u.name, u.head_image as "headImage", e.title, e.content, e.like_num as "likeNum", e.unlike_num as "unlikeNum" from experience e left join sys_user u on e.user_id=u.user_id where e.user_id=#{userId} order by e.create_time desc
